strings.string: TUR_Change your digital satellite receiver settings

TUR_If you set to 'On', both the existing transponders and additional transponders that have not yet been stored to be located are scanned for new channels
TUR_When set to 'Off', only the factory default transponders of the satellites you previously selected will be scanned for new channels.

TUR_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
